r.s: Driver based class to calculate holidays in Spain.
r.d: Date_Holidays helps you calculate the dates and titles of holidays and other special celebrations. This is the driver for calculating holidays in Spain; with thanks to Jesús Espino.
r.n: * Implemented unit tests (bug #17461). * Renamed "Vispera de año nuevo" to "Noche Vieja". * Changed the id "republicDaySpain" to "hispanityDay". * Fixed a error calculating the mothers day. * Added Saint Saturday as "Sabado Santo". * Added the easter day as "Domingo de resurrección". * Added a test.
